Detailed Description

EmbededWebViewController.h This class is used to display a full-screen UIWebView for CTAs which fall under the category of "web".

Author:
InMobi Copyright 2011 InMobi Technologies Pvt. Ltd.. All rights reserved.

This method is called when the Modal View Controller has to be dismissed.

- (id) initWithUrl: (NSString *)  url
withDelegate: (id<AdScreenDismissDelegate>)  viewDelegate
webPageTile: (NSString *)  wvTitle 

Use this method to obtain an instance of EmbededWebViewController.

Parameters:
url The url to be opened by the webView.
viewDelegate The delegate to notify when this Modal View Controller will be dismissed.

Returns an instance of EmbededWebViewController.
